title: KotlinTutorial

metadata.description: Learn about KotlinTutorial with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn Kotlin
Kotlin is a modern, trending programming language.
Kotlin is easy to learn, especially if you already know Java (it is 
  100% compatible with Java).
Kotlin is used to develop Android apps, server side apps, and much more.
Start learning Kotlin now »
Examples in Each Chapter
Our "
code and view the result in your browser:
Example
fun main() {
  println("Hello World")
}

Click on the "
We recommend reading this tutorial, in the sequence listed in the left menu.
Kotlin Exercises
Test Yourself With Exercises
Exercise:
Insert the missing part of the code below to output "Hello World".
() {
  println("Hello World")
}
Submit Answer »
Start the Exercise
Kotlin Quiz
Learn by taking a quiz! This quiz will give you a signal of how much you know about Kotlin.
Take the Kotlin Quiz
Learn by Examples
Learn by examples! This tutorial supplements all explanations with clarifying examples.
See All Kotlin Examples
Download Kotlin
Download Kotlin from github:

Create a free  account and get access to more features and learning materials:
View your completed tutorials, exercises, and quizzes
Keep an eye on your progress and daily streaks
Set goals and create learning paths
Create your own personal website

Note:
This is an optional feature. You can study at  without creating an account.

quiz.question: What is Kotlin?
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of Kotlin is 'easy to learn'.

summary: This tutorial covers KotlinTutorial concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use KotlinTutorial effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of KotlinTutorial and how to apply it in your projects.
